overview: For the fourth time in his illustrious cinematic history, director Gregory Dark examines the dialectical triad between prostitutes, sex and men in New Wave Hookers 4. Join your host, Half-Pint the Uber Dwarf, on a balls-out, candy coated roller coaster ride through the weirdest, wildest, wettest sexual scenarios ever conceived by man! Is it a serious scientific treatise posing as a no-holes-barred sex movie? Or vice-versa? Please write in and tell us!
title: New Wave Hookers 4
